WorkItem.ClosedComment: Publishing a new release with all needed DLL.
WorkItem.Description:
When attempting to create a Custom Update from Release v1.3.1407.11, WSUS Package Publisher crashes.
Including the following files from a previous release fixes the issue:
CustomUpdateElements.dll
CustomUpdateElementViewer.dll
CustomUpdateEngine.exe
WorkItem.Summary: Release v1.3.1407.11 doesn't include some custom updates files, crashes

Comments.Message: Same problem here. Using windows server 2008r2
To work around this, keep these old files from the previous version. Until I publish the next release.
